name: Journey to Appreciation
description:
Puzzle top down adventure about giving thanks (made in 5 days)

Gameplay:

Find objects to give thank to gain gratefulness energy, so the character can survive and process to the journey of self discovery and appreciation for life.

Control:

W/A/S/D to move

E to interact

Team: CTG game creators

Designer: Alex, Max

Programmer: Colin, Alex, Tom

Art: Molly, Eesta

Coach: Tom
